de.lessvoid.niftyinternal

Class NiftyResourceLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.NiftyResourceLoader

  • public class NiftyResourceLoader
extends Object
    A simple wrapper around resource loading should anyone decide to change their minds how this is meant to work in the future.
    Author:
    Kevin Glass, void (made it a none static class)

        public void removeAllResourceLocations()

public InputStream getResourceAsStream(@Nonnull

        Get a resource
        Parameters:
